insert into t_enterprise_channel_user_history( uid, channel_user_id, enterprise_id, franchisee_id, tenant_id, type, create_time, update_time) values
(#{item.uid}, #{item.channelUserId}, #{item.enterpriseId}, #{item.franchiseeId}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.type}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime} )
